dndads.Title: Dungeons and Daddies
dndads.Description: A dungeons and dragons podcast about four dads from our world flung into the forgotten realms on a quest to find their lost sons. I started listening to this podcast in its early stages at episode 7. I have listened to every episode since, and even subscribe to their patreon.

will.Title: Will Wood
will.Description: Will Wood (Formerly known as Will Wood and The Tapeworms) is an American avant-pop singer-songwriter, pianist/multi-instrumentalist, filmmaker, and multimedia artist. I started listening to Will Wood early this year and several songs off of his 'The Normal album' have made it to the top of my most listened to songs on Spotify list.

hazel.Title: Hazel
hazel.Description: This is my cat Hazel, he is a cutie patootie. Key features include is chumby tummy, his kissable forehead, and his capability to do no wrong ever.

isaac.Title: The Binding of Isaac
isaac.Description: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy roguelike elements. I started playing this game in 2015 and still play occasionally, I have logged 560 hours so far, and have collected 330 achievements over the span of all 3 DLC update packs.
